properties.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior
properties.headline: Freeze Watch issued February 29 at 10:29AM PST until March 1 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible.

* WHERE...Much of interior Mendocino County, including Ukiah,
Willits, Laytonville, Covelo, Hopland, and Boonville.

* WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near freezing temperatures will be
possible Monday morning as well.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
